translations: 狼吞虎咽地；贪得无厌地

sentences.sentence: While local gulls will dive voraciously for such handouts, the tern flies on.
sentences.translation: 当地的海鸥会贪婪地扑向这些施舍的食物，而燕鸥会继续飞行。

sentences.sentence: All I can say for myself is that I read voraciously and draw fairly well.
sentences.translation: 我唯一能标榜自己的是，我读了很多书，画得还算不错。

sentences.sentence: The term entered into IT-speak only a year ago and has spread voraciously.
sentences.translation: 一年前这个词才成为IT行话，现在已经广为传播。
